Class ec.transform.coverage.Merger 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.transform.coverage.Application
           |
           +----ec.transform.coverage.Merger
public class Merger
extends Application
This class merges one or more logfiles and puts the result on standard output. Used to implement ecov-merge.

The actual format of input is:

java Merger scriptName logfile...

main(String[])

Report on usage of the application.
